item.title: 沙特阿美石油公司支持的 Cognite 公司在人工智能领域的扩张押注印度
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）支持的工业软件公司 Cognite 周三在印度南部城市班加罗尔开设了人工智能服务中心，并表示正在探索与印度顶级企业集团签订合同的可能性。【原文：Saudi Aramco-backed industrial software firm Cognite on Wednesday opened its AI services center in the southern Indian city of Bengaluru and said it was exploring potential contracts with top conglomerates in the country.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部批准 Venture Global 从路易斯安那州出口液化天然气项目
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的政府周三批准 Venture Global LNG 从路易斯安那州拟建的设施出口天然气。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration granted Venture Global LNG approval on Wednesday to export natural gas from a proposed Louisiana facility which had faced delays under former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部批准 Venture Global 从路易斯安那州出口液化天然气项目
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的政府周三批准 Venture Global LNG 从路易斯安那州拟建的设施出口天然气。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration granted Venture Global LNG approval on Wednesday to export natural gas from a proposed Louisiana facility which had faced delays under former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 德意志银行计划在 2025 年 "大幅 "削减分行并减少 2000 名员工
item.description: 德意志银行首席执行官克里斯蒂安-斯温（Christian Sewing）周三表示，德意志银行将在今年 "大幅 "削减分支机构，并在 2025 年将零售银行的员工人数减少约 2000 人。【原文：Deutsche Bank will reduce branches by a "signficant" number this year and trim headcount of the retail bank by around 2,000 people in 2025, Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，汽油和馏分油库存下降 - EIA
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三表示，上周美国原油库存增幅超过预期，而汽油和馏分油库存则有所下降。【原文：U.S. crude stocks rose more than expected, while gasoline and distillate inventories fell last week, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲钢铁制造商就欧盟钢铁行动计划发表看法
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三宣布了一项行动计划，旨在提高欧洲萎靡不振的钢铁行业的竞争力，使其免受美国对进口钢铁和铝征收关税的影响。【原文：The European Commission announced on Wednesday an action plan to make Europe's ailing steel sector more competitive and to shield it from the impact of U.S. tariffs on imports of steel and aluminium, prompting reactions from major industrial actors, analysts, and think tanks.】

item.title: 根据具有里程碑意义的欧盟规则，谷歌被控两项罪名，面临罚款风险
item.description: 随着反垄断监管机构继续打击大型科技公司，Alphabet 旗下公司谷歌周三被指控违反了两项具有里程碑意义的欧盟规则。【原文：Alphabet unit Google was hit with two charges of breaching landmark EU rules on Wednesday, as antitrust regulators continued their crackdown against Big Tech.】

item.title: 苹果公司被欧盟反垄断监管机构勒令向竞争对手开放
item.description: 苹果公司周三被欧盟反垄断监管机构勒令向竞争对手开放其封闭的生态系统，后者详细说明了如何按照该集团具有里程碑意义的规则进行开放，以及不遵守规则可能导致的调查和罚款。【原文：Apple was ordered by EU antitrust regulators on Wednesday to open up its closed ecosystem to rivals, with the latter spelling out details on how to go about it in line with the bloc's landmark rules and where non-compliance could lead to an investigation and fines.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯首席执行官称，无法保证投资 33 亿美元的绿色钢铁厂的经济性
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯集团首席执行官表示，除非德国确保有足够的绿色氢气供应，否则蒂森克虏伯计划在杜伊斯堡建造的一个碳中性钢厂可能会搁浅。【原文：A planned 3-billion-euro ($3.3 billion) site Thyssenkrupp is building in Duisburg to make carbon-neutral steel could be stranded unless Germany ensures there's sufficient green hydrogen to supply it, the conglomerate's CEO said.】

item.title: 半导体企业呼吁制定《欧盟芯片法 2.0
item.description: 计算机芯片制造商和半导体供应链公司周三呼吁欧盟委员会推出一项新的支持计划，作为《2023 芯片法案》的后续行动，此次除生产外，还将重点关注芯片设计、材料和设备。【原文：Computer chip makers and semiconductor supply chain firms on Wednesday called on the European Commission to launch a new support program as a follow up to the 2023 Chips Act, this time focusing on chip design, materials and equipment, in addition to manufacturing.】

item.title: 瑞波币首席执行官称美国证券交易委员会将撤销对加密货币公司的上诉
item.description: 加密货币公司瑞波实验室首席执行官布拉德-加林豪斯（Brad Garlinghouse）在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，美国证券交易委员会将放弃对瑞波实验室的上诉。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission will drop its appeal against Ripple Labs, the crypto firm's CEO Brad Garlinghouse said in a post on social media platform X.】

item.title: 波音首席财务官对关税影响零部件供应表示担忧
item.description: 波音公司首席财务官布赖恩-韦斯特（Brian West）周三表示，公司担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施会影响供应商的零部件供应。【原文：Boeing CFO Brian West said on Wednesday the company is concerned about the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs on the availability of parts from its suppliers.】

item.title: 腾讯加入中国人工智能支出竞赛，增加 2025 年资本支出
item.description: 中国科技巨头腾讯周三表示，随着人工智能开发和基础设施建设的加强，公司将在2025年提高资本支出。【原文：Chinese technology giant Tencent said on Wednesday it would boost capital expenditure in 2025, as it strengthens artificial intelligence development and infrastructure.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会称欧盟应资助乌克兰接入卫星互联网
item.description: 欧盟委员会在本周三发表的关于欧洲防务未来的白皮书中表示，欧盟应资助乌克兰获得可由欧盟商业供应商提供的太空服务。【原文：The European Union should fund Ukraine's access to space services that can be provided by EU-based commercial providers, the European Commission said in its white paper on the future of European defence published on Wednesday.】

item.title: Elkann 称 Stellantis 将在上半年任命新首席执行官
item.description: 汽车制造商斯泰兰特董事长约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）周三表示，斯泰兰特仍将在今年上半年任命一位新的首席执行官。【原文：Automaker Stellantis remains on course to appoint a new chief executive in the first half of the year, Chairman John Elkann said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟努力让特朗普坐到关税谈判桌前
item.description: 作为欧盟的顶级谈判代表之一，萨宾-韦恩德曾就英国脱欧问题与英国交锋，并在世界各地推动艰难的贸易谈判。【原文：As one of the European Union's top negotiators, Sabine Weyand has battled Britain over Brexit and driven tough trade talks around the world.】

item.title: 美国能源部批准 Venture Global CP2 出口许可
item.description: 美国能源部周三表示，已批准 Venture Global 为其位于路易斯安那州卡梅伦教区的 CP2 液化天然气项目申请出口许可证。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy said on Wednesday it approved Venture Global’s export permit request for its proposed CP2 LNG project in Cameron Parish, Louisiana.】

item.title: 液化天然气流量创纪录，日产量下降，美国天然气价格攀升 2%，创一周新高
item.description: 由于液化天然气（LNG）出口厂的天然气流量创下新高，且日产量再次下降，美国天然气期货周三攀升约2%，创下一周新高。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures climbed about 2% to a one-week high on Wednesday on record gas flows to liquefied natural gas (LNG) export plants and another drop in daily output.】

item.title: 花旗银行向伦敦金属交易所（LME）仓库提供线索，以达成有利可图的租金交易
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，在过去几天里，花旗集团已将大量铅存入伦敦金属交易所（LME）批准的仓库，进行所谓的租金共享交易。【原文：Significant amounts of lead have been deposited in London Metal Exchange (LME) approved warehouses by Citigroup for so-called rent-sharing deals over the past few days, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞典人工智能初创公司 IntuiCell 称，机器狗能像人类一样学习和适应环境
item.description: 瑞典一家人工智能初创公司IntuiCell周三表示，该公司创造了一种名为 "露娜"（Luna）的机器狗，它拥有功能性数字神经系统，能够像人类和许多动物一样学习和适应。【原文：A Swedish AI startup company has created a robot dog named Luna that has a functional digital nervous system capable of learning and adapting like humans and many animals, the company, IntuiCell, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 小额贷款公司 Tala 获得 1.5 亿美元债务融资，以拓展墨西哥业务
item.description: 向新兴市场客户发放小额贷款的美国金融科技公司 Tala 周三表示，该公司已获得 1.5 亿美元的债务融资，以扩大其在墨西哥的业务。【原文：U.S.-based fintech Tala, which grants small-sized loans to clients in emerging markets, has secured a $150 million debt facility to expand its business in Mexico, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商广汽集团将与华为合作推出全新汽车品牌
item.description: 中国汽车制造商广州汽车集团周三表示，已成立一家新公司，与科技巨头华为合作推出高端汽车品牌。【原文：Chinese carmaker Guangzhou Automobile Group said on Wednesday that it had set up a new company to work with tech giant Huawei to launch a high-end car brand.】

item.title: 中国人工智能公司智璞在国家支持下融资 2.57 亿美元
item.description: 据中国国家媒体《新京报》周三报道，中国人工智能初创公司智璞人工智能（Zhipu AI）已从成都政府支持的基金获得了3亿元人民币（合4150万美元）的投资，这是中国城市支持国内人工智能发展的最新举措。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu AI has secured 300 million yuan ($41.5 million) in investment from a Chengdu government-backed fund, state media, the Beijing News reported on Wednesday, in the latest move by Chinese cities to support domestic AI development.】

item.title: 西门子首席财务官称政治不确定性影响客户决策
item.description: 西门子首席财务官拉尔夫-托马斯（Ralf Thomas）周三表示，由于政治不确定性，西门子在美国的客户有些犹豫不决，但他预计这种情况不会持续太久。【原文：Siemens is seeing some hesitancy among customers in the United States due to political uncertainties, Chief Financial Officer Ralf Thomas said on Wednesday, although he does not expect the situation to last.】

item.title: 关税不确定性为并购反弹蒙上阴影，奥本海默下调高盛和杰富瑞评级
item.description: 美国券商奥本海默周三下调了高盛、杰富瑞金融和凯雷的评级，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的不确定性对交易构成威胁。【原文：U.S. brokerage Oppenheimer downgraded Goldman Sachs , Jefferies Financial and Carlyle on Wednesday, citing a threat to dealmaking from uncertainty over President Donald Trump's tariff policies.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚再次寻求美国豁免对石油公司 NIS 的制裁
item.description: 塞尔维亚国家天然气公司（Srbijagas）首席执行官周三表示，由俄罗斯天然气工业石油公司（Gazprom Neft）和俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）控股的塞尔维亚国家石油公司（NIS）已向美国提交了第二份豁免制裁的申请。【原文：Serbian oil company NIS , majority-owned by Russian Gazprom Neft and Gazprom , has submitted a second request to the U.S. for a waiver of sanctions, the CEO of state gas company Srbijagas said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西班牙初创企业 Playtomic 在新一轮融资中估值 2.73 亿美元
item.description: 西班牙初创公司 Playtomic 通过手机应用租赁球拍运动场地，其首席执行官费利克斯-鲁伊斯（Felix Ruiz）周三表示，该公司在新一轮融资中获得了 2.5 亿欧元（2.73 亿美元）的估值。【原文：Spanish startup Playtomic, which rents racket sports courts through a mobile phone app, achieved a valuation of 250 million euros ($273 million) in a new funding round, its chief executive Felix Ruiz said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长库比切克对将比特币作为储备资产持 "怀疑态度
item.description: 捷克国家银行董事会成员扬-库比切克（Jan Kubicek）对将比特币纳入该银行的巨额储备持 "怀疑态度"，因为他担心法律上的不确定性以及数字货币的波动性。【原文：Czech National Bank board member Jan Kubicek is "sceptical" about the inclusion of bitcoin among the bank's hefty reserves, wary of legal uncertainties and concerns around volatility of the digital currency.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard 在欧特克发起董事会争夺战
item.description: Starboard Value 公司周三在欧特克（Autodesk）发起了一场董事会争夺战，引发了人们对这家设计软件制造商利润率的担忧，并加剧了这家激进投资者为实现公司变革而进行的长期斗争。【原文：Starboard Value on Wednesday launched a boardroom battle at Autodesk , raising concerns over the design software maker's margins and intensifying the activist investor's prolonged struggle to effect changes at the company.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普加征关税，欧盟提议削减15%的钢铁进口量
item.description: 欧盟一位高级官员周三表示，欧盟将从4月起收紧钢铁进口配额，将进口量再减少15%，此举旨在防止廉价钢铁在华盛顿征收新关税后涌入欧洲市场。【原文：The European Union will tighten steel import quotas to reduce inflows by a further 15% from April, a senior EU official said on Wednesday, in a move aimed at preventing cheap steel flooding the European market after Washington imposed new tariffs.】
